title: Git Client Scoping Questions
description: Customer-facing scoping questionnaire for Repos issues

requiredFields: Was the [Personal Access Token (PAT)](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/devops/organizations/accounts/use-personal-access-tokens-to-authenticate?view=azure-devops&tabs=Windows) valid and correctly configured?
Were the [SSH keys properly configured](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/devops/repos/git/use-ssh-keys-to-authenticate?view=azure-devops) and added to the Azure DevOps account?

Did the user have the necessary permissions to access the repository?
  1. [Default](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/devops/organizations/security/default-git-permissions?view=azure-devops)
  2. [Download permission report](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/devops/organizations/security/download-permissions-report?view=azure-devops)
Is [Git Credential Manager](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/devops/repos/git/set-up-credential-managers?view=azure-devops) being used?
Were there any network or proxy settings blocking access to Azure DevOps?

Was the Git client properly configured for authentication?
# Git Operations, Limits and Performance
Are there [errors related to limits](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/devops/repos/git/limits?view=azure-devops)?
Were there any errors during Git clone, push, or pull operations?
Was the [Git client version up-to-date](https://git-scm.com/downloads)?
Were there any issues with [Git commands](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/devops/repos/git/command-prompt?view=azure-devops) like `git log`, `git rebase`, or `git checkout`?

Was the [repository structure](https://learn.microsoft.com/training/modules/configure-project-repository-structure-support-secure-pipelines/2-organize-project-repository-structure) correctly configured for submodules?
Were there any performance issues related to network latency or throttling?

Check the [repository health](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/devops/repos/git/repo-health?view=azure-devops)
# Integration and Migration Issues

Was the integration between [Azure DevOps and GitHub configured](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/devops/cross-service/github-integration?toc=%2Fazure%2Fdevops%2Frepos%2Ftoc.json&view=azure-devops) correctly?

Were there any issues migrating repositories from [SVN](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/devops/repos/git/perform-migration-from-svn-to-git?view=azure-devops), [TFVC](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/devops/repos/git/import-from-tfvc?view=azure-devops), GitLab, or other platforms?
# Pipeline and Build Configuration
Are [multiple repositories](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/devops/pipelines/repos/multi-repo-checkout?view=azure-devops) being checked out?
Were the pipeline configurations correctly set up for [Azure repository access](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/devops/pipelines/security/secure-access-to-repos?view=azure-devops&tabs=yaml)?
Were there any issues with YAML pipelines accessing repositories in other projects?
Were the [pipeline permissions](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/devops/pipelines/policies/permissions?view=azure-devops#pipeline-permissions) properly configured?
Were there any errors related to build failures or [repository size limits](https://learn.microsoft.com/azure/devops/repos/git/limits?view=azure-devops)?

Was the pipeline using the correct Git version or dependencies?
# Encoding and File Management
Were the file encoding settings properly configured in the repository?
Were there any issues with SJIS-encoded files causing garbled text?
Were there any blocked files due to user actions or permissions?
Were the files properly tracked and managed using Git LFS?
Were there any issues with file locking or branch policies?
